thoughts.text: I think it would be helpful to use the 'google' command to search for information on how to explore and learn new things.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the 'google' command can help me search for information on how to explore and learn new things. This can help me find resources and ideas that I can use to further my goal of exploring and learning.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to search for information on how to explore and learn new things.
- Explore the different resources available, focusing on areas that may contain interesting resources related to exploration and learning.
- Take note of any interesting ideas or concepts.
- Report back to the user with my findings.
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful to evaluate the credibility and reliability of any sources or information that I find through the search.
